name: She Hates Unicorns
description:
She Hates Unicorns is a third person game.
You play as a charming red-haired woman who is armed with a katana.

You have to fight all the unicorn followers in a limited time.
If you fail a bomb will explode and that will be the end of the adventure for you.

You will have to satisfy the pleasures of these naughty unicorns.

The action will take place in a city in which you will have to flush out all your enemies.

  • Improvements available throughout the map to help you reach your goal.
  • Katana game
  • Naughty and daring content
  • A magnificent stylized aesthetic
  • Enemies dressed in furries suit
  • Various enemies
  • Great replayability

A fun and quirky game where you will feel good
